hero.tagline: Reka Dithoto tsa Lebenkele la Gago
hero.subtitle: Go reka bonolo le ka bonako. Ga go na diforomo tse di raraaneng. Amogela dithoto tsa gago di isiwa kwa lebenkeleng la gago.
hero.communitySupported: Kopanang le mabenkele a fetang 500 mo tikologong ya gago

support.needHelp: A o tlhoka thuso? A re buisaneng!
support.defaultMessage: Dumelang! Ke tlhoka thuso ka taelo ya me ya TOSS.

groupBuying.title: Go Reka ka Setlhopha - Ditlhotlhwa tse di Botoka
groupBuying.description: Kopanego le beng ba mabenkele ba bangwe mo tikologong ya gago go reka dithoto mmogo le go bona ditlhotlhwa tsa wholesale. Letsatsi le le lengwe la thomelo go botlhe!
groupBuying.benefit1: Boloka go fitlha go 20% mo ditaolong tse dintsi
groupBuying.benefit3: Reka le baagisane ba ba ikanyegang
groupBuying.memberCount: Beng ba mabenkele ba 53 mo tikologong ya gago

delivery.estimatedArrival: Nako e e lebeletsiweng ya thomelo:

ordered.title: Taelo e Amogetswе
ordered.description: Re amogetsе taelo ya gago mme re e baakanya

preparing.title: Re Baakanya Dithoto tsa Gago
preparing.description: Re paka taelo ya gago ka kelotlhoko

outForDelivery.title: E mo Tseleng
outForDelivery.description: Motsamaisi o tlisa dithoto tsa gago kwa lebenkeleng la gago

delivered.title: E Tlisiwa
delivered.description: Dithoto tsa gago di gorile kwa lebenkeleng la gago

offline.title: O sa Inthanete
offline.message: Dilo tse dingwe di ka se dire sentle kwa ntle ga inthanete. Re tla boloka tiro ya gago mme re kopanye fa o boa inthaneteng.
offline.limitedFeatures: Dilo tse di fokologileng di bonagala
